meaning: in spite of what was said before / regardless of the preceding statements / even though the previous statement(s) said this, the following statement overrides it.
example: Tenants are allowed to keep pets in the building. Notwithstanding the foregoing, aggressive dog breeds are prohibited.

meaning: From now on in this document, we’ll call this...
example: John David (hereinafter referred to as “the Buyer”) agrees to purchase the property.

meaning: This clause applies even if something else in the document disagrees
example: Notwithstanding anything to the contrary, the company may terminate the agreement at any time with notice.

meaning: Only if and when this condition applies.
example: The company will provide support to the extent that resources are available.
